name: Washed Out
description: '''Ernest Weatherly Greene Jr.''' (born October 3, 1982), better known by the [[stage name]] '''Washed Out''', is an American singer, songwriter, and record producer. He is commonly associated with the genres of [[bedroom pop]], [[chillwave]], [[dream pop]], and [[synth-pop]]. His 2009 breakout song "[[Feel It All Around]]" is generally regarded as the definitive chillwave track that set the template for the genre, leading ''[[Pitchfork (website)|Pitchfork]]'' to dub him the "Godfather of Chillwave".
